entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
